column1: Identify and describe each of Newton's Laws.
Identify all the forces exerted on an object.
Represent all the forces exerted on an object with a free-body diagram.
Determine the components of a force from the magnitude and direction of the force.
Identify Newton's third law (action/reaction) pairs of forces.
Describe situations in which the velocity of an object is a nonzero constant when no net force acts on the object.
Describe what an inertial reference frame is and how it is related to Newton's Laws.
